title: playingcards.py
description: A Python wrapper for playing cards, includes the ability to display an ASCII image of the card.

title: Collatz Conjecture Visual
description: A visualization of the Collatz Conjecture, a mathematical sequence that starts with any positive integer and alternates between adding one and halving the number until it reaches 1.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio website, built with React + Gatsby
